select distinct(r1.menu_id) as menuId, r1.name ,r1.parent_id as parentId , r1.url , r1.type, r1.create_time as createTime, r1.update_time as updateTime, r1.remark ,r1.is_show as isShow ,r1.parent_name as parentName from zw_sys_menu as r1 left join zw_sys_menu as r2 on r2.menu_id = r1.parent_id
status = 1
and is_delete = #{isDelete}
and r1.menu_id like '%${menuId}%'
and r1.name like '%${name}%'
select menu_id as menuId ,name from zw_sys_menu where is_delete = 0 and status = 1 and parent_id=#{parentId}
select menu_id from zw_sys_menu where parent_id = "#" and is_delete = 0 and status = 1
select * from zw_sys_menu where menu_id = #{menuId} and is_delete= 0 and status = 1
select * from zw_sys_menu where is_delete = 0 and status = 1 and parent_id=#{menuId}

select DISTINCT(t1.menu_id) as menuId,t1.parent_id as parentId ,t1.name ,t1.icon,t3.menu_id as selectedId from zw_sys_menu t1 left join zw_sys_menu t2 on t1.parent_id = t2.menu_id left join sys_role_menu t3 on t1.menu_id = t3.menu_id and t3.role_id= #{roleId} where t1.status = 1 and t2.status = 1

select DISTINCT(t1.menu_id) as id,t1.parent_id as parent ,t1.name as text ,t1.icon, case when t1.type='1' then 'file' when t1.type='0' then 'default' END 'type' from zw_sys_menu t1 left join zw_sys_menu t2 on t1.parent_id = t2.menu_id where t1.status = 1

select * from zw_sys_menu where menu_id in( select menu_id from sys_role where role_id in ( select role_id from sys_user_role where user_id=(select user_id from sys_user where account =#{account})) ) and status = 1
mapper.delete: update zw_sys_menu set status = -1 where menu_id = #{menuId}
update zw_sys_menu set status = -1 where parent_id = #{menuId}
